ui.name: Name
ui.downloadAndSetup: Download and set up the AI model and knowledge base to start chatting. Everything runs on your device—your data never leaves your computer.

agent.welcome: Hi! I'm Confidant, your privacy-first AI assistant for health questions.
agent.privacy: Everything runs on your device—your conversations stay private and never leave your computer.
agent.disclaimer: I'm not a substitute for professional medical advice. If you have serious health concerns, please see a healthcare professional.
agent.askAnything: Ask me anything about health—I'm here to help.

errors.title: Error
errors.modelNotReady: Model not initialized. Open Settings and initialize a model.
errors.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.modelNotSetUp: The model isn't set up yet. Open Settings and initialize a model.
errors.pythonIssue: Python setup issue. Install Python 3 and llama-cpp-python, then try again.
errors.timeout: That took too long. Try a shorter question.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 4 characters long
errors.duplicateUserName: A user with this name already exists

cached.hi: Hi! I'm Confidant, your privacy-first AI assistant for health questions. Everything runs on your device so your data stays private. What would you like to know?
cached.hello: Hello! I'm Confidant—a health assistant that runs entirely on your device. Your conversations stay private. How can I help you today?
cached.hey: Hey! I'm Confidant, your on-device health assistant. I'm not a substitute for professional medical advice, but I can help with general health questions. What's on your mind?
cached.whatAreYou: I'm Confidant, your privacy-first AI assistant for health questions. I run completely on your device, so your conversations stay private and never leave your computer.
cached.whoAreYou: I'm Confidant, your privacy-first AI assistant for health questions. I'm here to help answer your health-related questions while keeping everything private and secure on your device. I'm not a substitute for professional medical advice.
cached.whatCanYouDo: I can help answer health-related questions, provide information from my knowledge base, and assist with general health inquiries. Everything runs on your device for privacy. Remember, I'm not a substitute for professional medical advice—always consult a healthcare professional for serious concerns.
cached.help: I'm Confidant, your on-device health assistant. You can ask me about health, symptoms, conditions, treatments, and more. I'll use my knowledge base to help. For serious health concerns, please see a healthcare professional. What would you like to know?

setup.privacyInfo: Everything runs on your device—your conversations and data never leave your computer. This one-time setup downloads the AI model and knowledge base you need.
setup.settingsPrivacyInfo: Here you can download AI models and manage your knowledge bases. Everything runs on your device—your conversations and data never leave your computer.
setup.chooseModel: Choose a model already on your computer
setup.foundModels: We found {{count}} model file{{plural}} on your computer.
